DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Radiolabeled monoclonal antibody , iodine I 131 tositumomab yttrium Y 90 ibritumomab tiuxetan , find cancer cell carry cancer-killing substance without harm normal cell . This may effective treatment non-Hodgkin 's lymphoma . PURPOSE : This clinical trial study side effect , best dose , well iodine I 131 tositumomab yttrium Y 90 ibritumomab tiuxetan work treat patient non-Hodgkin 's lymphoma .
DOC.brief_title: Iodine I 131 Tositumomab Yttrium Y 90 Ibritumomab Tiuxetan Treating Patients With Non-Hodgkin 's Lymphoma
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : Primary - Determine relationship estimate absorb dose tumor response use different dosimetric methodology patient non-Hodgkin 's lymphoma treat iodine I 131 tositumomab yttrium Y 90 ibritumomab tiuxetan . - Determine relationship estimate absorbed dose normal organ toxicity use different dosimetric methodology patient . Secondary - Assess difference dose-response relationship dosimetric methodology patient . - Assess influence prior therapy dose-response relationship hematologic toxicity patient . OUTLINE : Patients stratify accord plan radioimmunotherapy treatment ( iodine I 131 tositumomab v yttrium Y 90 ibritumomab tiuxetan ) . - Stratum 1 : Patients receive dosimetric rituximab IV follow indium In 111 ( ^111In ) ibritumomab tiuxetan IV 10 minute day 1 . Patients undergo positron emission tomography ( PET ) /CT scan single-photon emission compute tomography ( SPECT ) /CT scan 2-24 , 48-72 , 90-120 hour ^111In ibritumomab tiuxetan administration . Patients acceptable biodistribution receive therapeutic rituximab IV follow yttrium Y 90 ibritumomab tiuxetan IV 10 minute day 7-9 . - Stratum 2 : Patients receive dosimetric tositumomab IV 60 minute follow iodine I 131 ( ^131I ) tositumomab IV 20 minute day 0 . Patients undergo PET/CT scan SPECT/CT scan day 0 ; 2 , 3 4 ; 6 7 . Patients acceptable biodistribution receive therapeutic tositumomab IV 60 minute follow ^131I tositumomab IV 20 minute approximately day 7 . In stratum , blood collect baseline measure FLT-3 level . All patient also undergo baseline PET/CT scan . After completion study treatment , patient follow every 3 month 1 year every 6 month thereafter . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 88 patient accrue study .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Diagnosis nonHodgkin 's lymphoma Measurable disease CT scan nuclear medicine image Eligible , standard care criterion , iodine I 131 tositumomab yttrium Y 90 ibritumomab tiuxetan treatment PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : No malignancy within past 3 year except basal cell carcinoma squamous cell carcinoma skin situ carcinoma cervix Not pregnant nursing Fertile patient must use effective contraception No alcoholism drug abuse within past 2 year No severe emotional , behavioral , psychiatric problem would limit study compliance PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : No concurrent participation another investigational drug study
